text:
Of course !

I'm working with python I request the data from this route :
```<https://api.hubapi.com/engagements/v1/engagements/paged>```
I get make the request including the offset. There's no problem in my code since I manage to get all the data from the API. However, I also get suppressed data which I can't understand.

Is it normal for HubSpot, could it be that I need to add a param to my request to get only not suppressed data ?
Thank you - is it possible to do this with GET vs a POST?
Is there V3 deal search line_item support?
